info.title: The modular house building cluster will be built by the investor in New Moscow
Rakova reported a two-fold increase in oncopods in Moscow
Deptrans Moscow reported reinstatement of payment of bank cards
The school for 12,000 places in Sosen will be completed before the end of the year
Efimov spoke of a new large-scale investor project in northern Moscow
Rakov announced the launching of workshops to prepare for the EEG in Moscow
Ethimov spoke about the contract for the redevelopment of part of the former promson at SWAO.
As part of the Szchuquino renovation, the house will be built on an individual project.
Efimov reported six redevelopment bids before the end of March
The Klenov New Moscow settlement built a cultural and dosage centre
